EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_IntroCloudNativeJava_MicrosoftAzure_WP_Q217.Download
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading Introducing Cloud-Native Java with Microsoft Azure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Introducing Cloud-Native Java with Microsoft Azure white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey. Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- White Paper: Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Microsoft Azure Reference Architectures for Cloud-Native Applications <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/pivotal-cloud-foundry-and-microsoft-azure-reference-architectures-for-cloud-native-applications]]>
- eBook: Embarking on the Cloud-Native Journey to More Agile IT <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/embarking-on-the-cloud-native-journey-to-more-agile-it]]>
- Partner Page: PCF and Microsoft Azure <[[https://pivotal.io/microsoft]]>
- Blog Post: Pivotal Cloud Foundry goes global with Azure <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-cloud-foundry-goes-global-with-microsoft-azure]]>
- Documentation: Pivotal Cloud Foundry Reference Architectures for Public Clouds and Your Data Center <[[http://docs.pivotal.io/pivotalcf/1-10/refarch/index.html]]>
- White Paper: Supercharging Your Microservices With NetflixOSS and Spring Cloud <[[http://info.pivotal.io/V3UW300Cgp0J200IN1WxlA0]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team For more on everything from Spring to cloud-native to accelerating your application development and more, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]>, taking place this September 24-27th in Washington, D.C. Use code S1P_Discount_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]> and save $100 off the price of admission.
